characters.name: Amber
characters.description: A secondary character with talk scenes and a meeting CG. Appears in social interactions.

characters.name: Aurora
characters.description: A mysterious girl with supernatural connections. Central to the mirror curse storyline. Has forest encounter scenes and makes an offer related to the curse.

characters.name: Dad
characters.description: The protagonist's father. Has a relationship score that tracks the family dynamic.

characters.name: Jessica
characters.description: A friend/potential love interest. Has scenes at a diner and a discovery subplot where she may learn about the protagonist's situation.

characters.name: Jordan
characters.description: A close friend and potential romance option. One of the primary relationship paths in the game.

characters.name: Lily
characters.description: A younger family member (likely sister). Connected to a plush toy subplot and has her own relationship progression with the protagonist.

characters.name: Luke
characters.description: A male friend and potential romance option. Available as a relationship path.

characters.name: Mom
characters.description: The protagonist's mother. Can discover the truth about the curse (momKnow variable). Has scenes where she notices changes.

characters.name: Samantha
characters.description: A friend and potential romance option. Involved in shopping scenes and has her own relationship arc.

characters.name: Serena
characters.description: Madame Serena - a character with extensive visual variations. Important role in the supernatural/curse storyline. The protagonist can research her.

characters.name: Vincent
characters.description: A male friend and potential romance option. Available as a relationship path.
